_comment_identityMetadata: // For using Microsoft you should never need to change this.
_comment_clientSecret: // if you are doing code or id_token code
_comment_skipUserProfile: // for AzureAD should be set to true.
_comment_responseType: // for login only flows use id_token. For accessing resources use id_token code
_comment_responseMode: // For login only flows we should have token passed back to us in a POST
_comment_: //scope: ['email', 'profile'] // additional scopes you may wish to pass
